code: @Before public void setup() {     MockConfigurationPropertySource source = new MockConfigurationPropertySource().     source.put("example.foo", "bar").     this.sources.add(source).     this.binder = new Binder(this.sources). }

@Test public void bindWhenIgnoringErrorsShouldBind() {     Example bound = this.binder.bind("example", Bindable.of(Example.class), new IgnoreErrorsBindHandler()).get().     assertThat(bound.getFoo()).isEqualTo(0). }
public void setFoo(int foo) {     this.foo = foo. }
